actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit without congressional approval expenditures of appropriated funds with respect to private property used as residences by individuals whom the Secret Service is authorized to protect.

summary.text: Prohibits expenditures of appropriated funds with respect to private property used as residences by individuals whom the Secret Service is authorized to protect without congressional approval.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit without congressional approval expenditures of appropriated funds with respect to private property used as residences by individuals whom the Secret Service is authorized to protect.
